
Subject: Your hosting account will expire soon

Hello %%%FIRST_NAME%%%,

Your shared hosting account will expire in %%%REMAINING_DAYS%%% days, on the:
%%%EXPIRATION_DATE%%%.

Please login into your control panel at:

%%%DTC_CLIENT_URL%%%

with your login %%%DTC_ADM_LOGIN%%% click on your my-account tab, and
renew it.

%%%SIGNATURE%%%
